name: BAG
description: Basisadministratie Adressen en Gebouwen, al the buildings in The Netherlands, with geometries, buildingyears, addresses, etc.

description: Data on almost anything and a hub to data elsewhere

name: Ecartico
description: Over 30.000 artists and their connections in 17th-century Amsterdam

name: RKD
description: Rijksbureau voor Kunsthistorische Documentatie, data on artists born, working or collected in The Netherlands

description: Combined Amsterdam museum and archival collections, includes reference data on streets, buildings, persons and districts

description: No longer existing buildings depicted in heritage collections

description: Getty's Art & Architecture Thesaurus describes museum objects, buildings and more
